page.title: 08Traffic at West Taphouse.
page.content: The Infant class did a traffic census counting the traffic in both directions.The A390 road is very busy and noisy.There are double white lines outside the school.There have been 6 accidents in the last 2 years near the school. The infant class was once a Toll House It is very near the road.You can hear the noise of the traffic in the classroom.They have asked for double glazing. {Results of 10 minute survey on 17/6/85 CAR LORRY VAN BUS CARAVAN MOTORBIKE 68 14 20 1 2 2 90 10 10 2 2 4 {Results of 10 minute survey on 18/6/85 81 10 9 1 2 1 In the holiday season the road is even busier as thousands of holidaymakers make their way further west. By Simon and Raymond
